video.title: A Young Doctor's Notebook
video.synopsis: Set during the Russian Revolution, this comic miniseries is based on a doctor's memories of his early career working in an out-of-the-way village.

episodes.synopsis: Using his journal to prompt his memory, the doctor recalls his youth, when he was sent to the frigid tundra of rural Russia at age 25.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Despite his efforts to look more commanding, the young doctor is still living in the shadow of the physician who formerly occupied the house.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Excruciating pain in his abdomen drives the young doctor to consider desperate measures.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: As the young doctor descends into dark hallucinations, his older self tries to prevent him from ruining his life.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: The young doctor and midwife Pelageya frantically attempt to cover up the morphine shortfall, leading to a life-threatening accident.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The younger doctor leaves Pelageya when he becomes besotted with a beautiful aristocrat.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The older doctor is appalled at his younger self's callousness about Pelageya's condition and his destructive behavior over Natasha's fiancé.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: An explosion rocks the hospital. The doctor is torn when he must choose between his morphine addiction and helping an injured Natasha.
episodes.title: Episode 4
